timeline.bodyText: This isn't really a good, long-term solution. I imagine some people will want to use Front50 for plugin info without necessarily downloading binaries from Front50 as well. This seemed like a bigger topic to bite off than what this PR is for. Do we add a CompositeFileDownloader class that lets FileDownloaders to inspect a URL and see if it's something they should be downloading? Seems like this might be the only path forward...?
